definition: to spin rapidly/to whirl around/(of time) to fly by
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: He lifted him in the air and spun him around.
sentences.chinese: 他把他抱起来，在空中飞转。

sentences.english: The propeller raced wildly as the stern rose.
sentences.chinese: 艉部抬起，螺旋桨离水飞转。

sentences.english: So the roller coaster ride continued up and down.
sentences.chinese: 这样，过山车继续上下飞转。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, life is very short and the older I get the quicker time seems to pass.
sentences.chinese: 遗憾的是，人生苦短，时光飞转流逝。

sentences.english: There was a whirl of dead leaves in the park.
sentences.chinese: 公园里有一团枯树叶在飞转。

definition: whirling/spinning around and around/round and plump (e.g. of fruit)
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
to make an about-turn/to reverse one's direction, policy, sequence etc/to turn things on their head
in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
